data.eml:eml: Eusyllinae, Exogoninae and Autolytinae (Syllidae: Polychaeta) from the Southern Mexican Pacific, with the description of three new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Salcedo, Diana L., Martín, Guillermo San, Solís-Weiss, Vivianne (2016): Eusyllinae, Exogoninae and Autolytinae (Syllidae: Polychaeta) from the Southern Mexican Pacific, with the description of three new species. Zootaxa 4158 (4): 507-522, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4158.4.4
